thread.title: Nestle's Milkybar targets healthy sweet spot with designer sugar

title: Nestle's Milkybar targets healthy sweet spot with designer sugar
text:
Nestle's Milkybar targets healthy sweet spot with designer sugar 8:48am EDT - 01:18 
Nestle is market testing a new sugar formula that it says can give chocolate bars reduced calories as it seeks to head off changing consumer demands and obesity crackdowns by world governments. Matthew Larotonda reports   
Nestle is market testing a new sugar formula that it says can give chocolate bars reduced calories as it seeks to head off changing consumer demands and obesity crackdowns by world governments. Matthew Larotonda reports  //reut.rs/2Gta16f
